20110126021859.000|20110126021902.000|CC1|BUSINESS.

20110126021904.000|20110126021905.000|CC1|1,000 WORKERS CAN NOW DO THE    
20110126021905.000|20110126021909.000|CC1|SAME WORK WITH 100.             
20110126021909.000|20110126021910.000|CC1|TODAY, JUST ABOUT ANY COMPANY   
20110126021910.000|20110126021911.000|CC1|CAN SET UP SHOP, HIRE WORKERS,  
20110126021911.000|20110126021912.000|CC1|AND SELL THEIR PRODUCTS WHEREVER

20110126021916.000|20110126021918.000|CC1|MEANWHILE, NATIONS LIKE CHINA

20110126024130.000|20110126024132.000|CC1|BUT ALL THE REST ARE HIT WITH   
20110126024132.000|20110126024135.000|CC1|ONE OF THE HIGHEST CORPORATE TAX
20110126024135.000|20110126024137.000|CC1|RATES IN THE WORLD. IT MAKES NO 
20110126024137.000|20110126024148.000|CC1|SENSE, AND IT HAS TO CHANGE.    
20110126024148.000|20110126024150.000|CC1|SO TONIGHT, I'M ASKING DEMOCRATS
20110126024150.000|20110126024152.000|CC1|AND REPUBLICANS TO SIMPLIFY THE 
20110126024152.000|20110126024154.000|CC1|SYSTEM.                         
20110126024154.000|20110126024156.000|CC1|GET RID OF THE LOOPHOLES.       
20110126024156.000|20110126024157.000|CC1|LEVEL THE PLAYING FIELD.        
20110126024157.000|20110126024159.000|CC1|AND USE THE SAVINGS TO LOWER THE
20110126024159.000|20110126024200.000|CC1|CORPORATE TAX RATE FOR THE FIRST
20110126024200.000|20110126024201.000|CC1|TIME IN 25 YEARS - WITHOUT      
20110126024201.000|20110126024208.000|CC1|ADDING TO OUR DEFICIT.          
20110126024208.000|20110126024220.000|CC1|IT CAN BE DONE.                 
20110126024220.000|20110126024221.000|CC1|TO HELP BUSINESSES SELL MORE    
20110126024221.000|20110126024222.000|CC1|PRODUCTS ABROAD, WE SET A GOAL  
20110126024222.000|20110126024227.000|CC1|OF DOUBLING OUR EXPORTS BY 2014 
20110126024227.000|20110126024228.000|CC1|- BECAUSE THE MORE WE EXPORT,   
20110126024228.000|20110126024232.000|CC1|THE MORE JOBS WE CREATE AT HOME.
20110126024232.000|20110126024234.000|CC1|ALREADY, OUR EXPORTS ARE UP.    
20110126024234.000|20110126024236.000|CC1|RECENTLY, WE SIGNED AGREEMENTS  
20110126024236.000|20110126024237.000|CC1|WITH INDIA AND CHINA THAT WILL  
20110126024237.000|20110126024239.000|CC1|SUPPORT MORE THAN 250,000 JOBS  
20110126024239.000|20110126024243.000|CC1|IN THE UNITED STATES.           
20110126024243.000|20110126024245.000|CC1|AND LAST MONTH, WE FINALIZED A  
20110126024245.000|20110126024246.000|CC1|TRADE AGREEMENT WITH SOUTH KOREA
20110126024246.000|20110126024247.000|CC1|THAT WILL SUPPORT AT LEAST      
20110126024247.000|20110126024250.000|CC1|70,000 AMERICAN JOBS.           
20110126024250.000|20110126024251.000|CC1|THIS AGREEMENT HAS UNPRECEDENTED
20110126024251.000|20110126024254.000|CC1|SUPPORT FROM BUSINESS AND LABOR;
20110126024254.000|20110126024257.000|CC1|DEMOCRATS AND REPUBLICANS, AND I
20110126024257.000|20110126024258.000|CC1|ASK THIS CONGRESS TO PASS IT AS 
20110126024258.000|20110126024307.000|CC1|SOON AS POSSIBLE.               
20110126024307.000|20110126024308.000|CC1|BEFORE I TOOK OFFICE, I MADE IT 
20110126024308.000|20110126024310.000|CC1|CLEAR THAT WE WOULD ENFORCE OUR 
20110126024310.000|20110126024312.000|CC1|TRADE AGREEMENTS, AND THAT I    
20110126024312.000|20110126024313.000|CC1|WOULD ONLY SIGN DEALS THAT KEEP 
20110126024313.000|20110126024316.000|CC1|FAITH WITH AMERICAN WORKERS, AND
20110126024316.000|20110126024319.000|CC1|PROMOTE AMERICAN JOBS.          
20110126024319.000|20110126024321.000|CC1|THAT'S WHAT WE DID WITH KOREA,  
20110126024321.000|20110126024322.000|CC1|AND THAT'S WHAT I INTEND TO DO  
20110126024322.000|20110126024323.000|CC1|AS WE PURSUE AGREEMENTS WITH    
20110126024323.000|20110126024325.000|CC1|PANAMA AND COLOMBIA, AND        
20110126024325.000|20110126024329.000|CC1|CONTINUE OUR ASIA PACIFIC AND   
20110126024329.000|20110126024338.000|CC1|GLOBAL TRADE TALKS.             
20110126024338.000|20110126024339.000|CC1|TO REDUCE BARRIERS TO GROWTH AND
20110126024339.000|20110126024340.000|CC1|INVESTMENT, I'VE ORDERED A      
20110126024340.000|20110126024341.000|CC1|REVIEW OF GOVERNMENT            
20110126024341.000|20110126024344.000|CC1|REGULATIONS.                    
20110126024344.000|20110126024345.000|CC1|WHEN WE FIND RULES THAT PUT AN  
20110126024345.000|20110126024348.000|CC1|UNNECESSARY BURDEN ON           
20110126024348.000|20110126024354.000|CC1|BUSINESSES, WE WILL FIX THEM.   
20110126024354.000|20110126024356.000|CC1|BUT I WILL NOT HESITATE TO      
20110126024356.000|20110126024358.000|CC1|CREATE OR ENFORCE COMMONSENSE   
20110126024358.000|20110126024359.000|CC1|SAFEGUARDS TO PROTECT THE       
20110126024359.000|20110126024408.000|CC1|AMERICAN PEOPLE.

20110126024409.000|20110126024411.000|CC1|COUNTRY FOR MORE THAN A CENTURY.
20110126024411.000|20110126024413.000|CC1|IT'S WHY OUR FOOD IS SAFE TO    
20110126024413.000|20110126024415.000|CC1|EAT, OUR WATER IS SAFE TO DRINK,
20110126024415.000|20110126024420.000|CC1|AND OUR AIR IS SAFE TO BREATHE. 
20110126024420.000|20110126024421.000|CC1|IT'S WHY WE HAVE SPEED LIMITS

20110126024431.000|20110126024432.000|CC1|PREVENT ANOTHER FINANCIAL

20110126024439.000|20110126024440.000|CC1|INSURANCE INDUSTRY FROM         
20110126024440.000|20110126024458.000|CC1|EXPLOITING PATIENTS.            
20110126024458.000|20110126024501.000|CC1|NOW, I'VE HEARD RUMORS THAT A   
20110126024501.000|20110126024502.000|CC1|FEW OF YOU HAVE SOME CONCERNS

20110126025114.000|20110126025129.000|CC1|FRIVOLOUS LAWSUITS.

20110126025144.000|20110126025146.000|CC1|PUTTING AT RISK CURRENT

20110126025149.000|20110126025151.000|CC1|OR PEOPLE WITH DISABILITIES;

20110126025154.000|20110126025156.000|CC1|SUBJECTING AMERICANS' GUARANTEED
20110126025156.000|20110126025158.000|CC1|RETIREMENT INCOME TO THE WHIMS

20110126025205.000|20110126025207.000|CC1|AND IF WE TRULY CARE ABOUT OUR  
20110126025207.000|20110126025210.000|CC1|DEFICIT, WE SIMPLY CANNOT AFFORD

20110126025212.000|20110126025213.000|CC1|CUTS FOR THE WEALTHIEST 2% OF   
20110126025213.000|20110126025231.000|CC1|AMERICANS.

20110126025232.000|20110126025233.000|CC1|OUR SCHOOLS, OR SCHOLARSHIPS

20110126025234.000|20110126025234.000|CC1|SHOULD ASK MILLIONAIRES TO GIVE 
20110126025234.000|20110126025236.000|CC1|UP THEIR TAX BREAK.             
20110126025236.000|20110126025238.000|CC1|IT'S NOT A MATTER OF PUNISHING  
20110126025238.000|20110126025239.000|CC1|THEIR SUCCESS. IT'S ABOUT       
20110126025239.000|20110126025250.000|CC1|PROMOTING AMERICA'S SUCCESS.

20110126025251.000|20110126025252.000|CC1|DO ON TAXES FOR ALL AMERICANS IS

20110126025253.000|20110126025302.000|CC1|CODE.                           
20110126025302.000|20110126025303.000|CC1|THIS WILL BE A TOUGH JOB, BUT   
20110126025303.000|20110126025305.000|CC1|MEMBERS OF BOTH PARTIES HAVE    
20110126025305.000|20110126025306.000|CC1|EXPRESSED INTEREST IN DOING     
20110126025306.000|20110126025307.000|CC1|THIS, AND I AM PREPARED TO JOIN 
20110126025307.000|20110126025314.000|CC1|THEM.                           
20110126025314.000|20110126025318.000|CC1|SO NOW IS THE TIME TO ACT.      
20110126025318.000|20110126025320.000|CC1|NOW IS THE TIME FOR BOTH SIDES  
20110126025320.000|20110126025323.000|CC1|AND BOTH HOUSES OF CONGRESS -   
20110126025323.000|20110126025325.000|CC1|DEMOCRATS AND REPUBLICANS - TO  
20110126025325.000|20110126025327.000|CC1|FORGE A PRINCIPLED COMPROMISE
